rules_text:
Vigilance, deathtouch
Whenever an Insect you control attacks, you may mill a card.
{T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.
{4}{B}{G}, Exile six cards from your graveyard, {T}: Transform Grist.
special_text:
As Grist enters, exile all cards from all graveyard and put an egg counter on each of them. You get an emblem with “If Insect you control dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn, you may play a card from exile with an egg counter on it. Spend mana as though it were any color to cast it.”
[+2]: Create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less and put an egg counter on it.
[-9]: Create a 1/1 green and black Insect creature token for each card in your graveyard and for each exiled card with an egg counter on it.
